title: ExtendSim DE
author: Artem Korz artemkorz_mm@mail.ru
text: The essential tool for predicting the behavior of complex and large-scale systems and processes, ExtendSim DE will help you explore the effects of variations, facilitate the management of resources, and optimize operations. ExtendSim DE adds a comprehensive, message-based discrete event architecture and capabilities plus other advanced modeling technologies to its already robust continuous modeling engine. Create impressively persuasive and powerful simulations with ExtendSim DE. --Artem KorznikovОтправлено из Почты Mail--Artem KorznikovОтправлено из Почты Mail--Artem KorznikovОтправлено из Почты Mail
